description:
Legendary weapons for your SAMURAI WARRIORS officers will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Weapons for:
Keiji Maeda, Nobunaga Oda, Mitsuhide Akechi, Oichi, Nō, Ranmaru Mori, Nagamasa Azai, Toshiie Maeda, Gracia, Katsuie Shibata, and Hisahide Matsunaga

■How to use
You can change Weapons from camp by selecting "Weapons" - "Equip Weapons".
name: Legendary Weapons Samurai Warriors Pack 1
